# Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Actor in a Drama Series

The '''Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Actor in a Drama Series''' is one of the award categories presented annually by the Critics' Choice Television Awards (BTJA) to recognize the work done by television actors. It was introduced in 2011 when the event was first initiated. The winners are selected by a group of television critics that are part of the Broadcast Television Critics Association. Bob Odenkirk holds the record for most wins in the category with three.
